SEARCH
Package MedicineInventorySystem

Class StockAdjuster

Object
StockAdjuster
public class StockAdjuster extends Object
The StockAdjuster class is responsible for managing stock adjustments (increase or decrease) of medications in the inventory. It interacts with a Map that stores medication names as keys and MedicationInventory objects as values.

    • inventory

  • Constructor Details

    • StockAdjuster

      public StockAdjuster(Map<String,MedicationInventory> inventory)
      Constructs a StockAdjuster with the provided inventory map.
      Parameters:
      inventory - a Map where keys are medication names and values are MedicationInventory objects.

  • Method Details

    • increaseStock

      public boolean increaseStock(String medicationName, int quantity)
      Increases the stock of a medication by a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication to update.
      quantity - the amount to add to the current stock.
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully increased, false if the medication was not found or if the quantity is invalid.

    • decreaseStock

      public boolean decreaseStock(String medicationName, int quantity)
      Decreases the stock of a medication by a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication to update.
      quantity - the amount to subtract from the current stock.
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully decreased, false if the medication was not found, if the stock was insufficient, or if the quantity is invalid.
